title: Security Deposits
text: Landlords have the right to collect a security deposit to cover potential damages or unpaid rent.

title: Rent Increases
text: Landlords have the right to increase rent, but they must provide proper notice.

question: Can I enter my tenant's property?
answer: Landlords generally cannot enter a tenant's dwelling without proper notice, except in emergencies.

question: Can I evict a tenant?
answer: Landlords have the right to evict a tenant for valid reasons, following proper procedures.

question: My tenant is constantly late with rent payments. What can I do?
